title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your listening powers are likely eagle sharp, enabling you to tune into what's not being said today. Its as if everyone is coming out of the woodwork to bend your sympathetic and reasonable ear. Fortunately, you can intuitively perceive what others need to hear in the moment and you wish to honor their trust in you by offering the best advice. Your willingness to suspend judgment until you accumulate all the facts makes you a voice of integrity. Physicist Christopher Isham wrote, Listening is an attitude of the heart, a genuine desire to be with another which both attracts and heals. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
